name: NATIONAL CHILD RELIEF SERVICES
briefDescription: National Child Relief Services plays an important part in protecting the global environment as well. A lot of awareness is created amongst the Indian people on deadly diseases like Heart Disease, Cancer, etc. for which camps are set up and run all over the India from time to time. Children living in the slums are also provided nutritious food, medicines and clothing free of cost. The other objective of the Trust is the instituting of Secondary, Primary and Middle level schools for offering free education to the poor and street children. All the support and indoctrination required are offered by National Child Relief Services while addressing epidemics related to AIDs and HIV.
